title: Sector Analysis Analysis Schema
description: Comprehensive schema for sector analysis JSON outputs from systematic sector evaluation framework

metadata.description: Core metadata about the sector analysis execution

execution_timestamp.description: ISO 8601 timestamp with optional microseconds and timezone

target_confidence_threshold.description: Target confidence threshold for institutional quality

discovery_confidence_inherited.description: Confidence score inherited from discovery phase

economic_context_integration.description: Whether economic context integration is enabled

cli_services_utilized.description: CLI services utilized for data collection

discovery_file_reference.description: Reference to the discovery file used as input

discovery_data_inheritance.description: Discovery phase data preservation and validation

sector_data.description: Core sector financial and performance data

companies_analyzed.description: Number of companies in sector analysis

yield_curve_spread.description: Yield curve spread in basis points

cli_service_validation.description: CLI service operational status and validation

business_cycle_positioning.description: Sector positioning within business and economic cycles

historical_performance_by_phase.description: Sector performance across different business cycle phases

interest_rate_sensitivity.description: Sector sensitivity to interest rate changes

leverage_impact.description: Impact of leverage on rate sensitivity

confidence.description: Confidence score for business cycle analysis

liquidity_cycle_positioning.description: Sector positioning within liquidity and credit cycles

confidence.description: Confidence score for liquidity cycle analysis

industry_dynamics_scorecard.description: Sector fundamental dynamics and competitive assessment

confidence.description: Confidence score for industry dynamics assessment

etf_price_vs_fair_value_analysis.description: ETF price versus fair value comparison

price_gap_analysis.description: Analysis of price gap to fair value

price_positioning.description: Price positioning relative to fair value

enhanced_economic_sensitivity.description: Enhanced economic sensitivity and correlation analysis

confidence.description: Confidence score for economic sensitivity analysis

macroeconomic_risk_scoring.description: Macroeconomic risk scoring and early warning systems

early_warning_system.description: Early warning system and monitoring framework

confidence.description: Confidence score for macroeconomic risk scoring

investment_recommendation_gap_analysis.description: Investment recommendation and portfolio allocation analysis

sector_structure_analysis.description: Enhanced sector structure and competitive analysis

sector_identifier.description: Valid sector identifier (utilities, energy, healthcare, etc.)

institutional_grade_threshold.description: Institutional grade requires minimum 0.8 confidence score

etf_ticker.description: Valid ETF ticker symbol (2-5 uppercase letters)
